original_title: Shin daisan no gokudô - boppatsu Kansai gokudô sensô
overview: When Masaki find themselves at a bar owned by his friend Akemi and ponder the recent strange happenings. He later accepted a proposal from his old rival Hattori and join the Todo-gang. A member, Hazama, beeing jealous over Masakis high rank and starts planning ways to get rid of the newcomer from the gang.
title: New Third Gangster: Outbreak Kansai Yakuza Wars
